titleInfo.title: Ramblin' Lou's 30th Anniversary Show at Melody Fair (18999)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing Ramblin' Lou's 30th Anniversary Show featuring Bill Anderson, Mary Lou Turner, Ramblin' Lou, Joanie Marshall, and the WXRL Ramblers at the Melody Fair on September 24. Poster features metal photoplates of Bill Anderson and Mary Lou Turner. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/48712/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
